title: Non-refunding of VAT to soybean exporters or economic impact of Soybean amendments. (arXiv:2305.01559v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: Exempting soybean and rapeseed exporters from VAT has a negative effect on the economy of $\$$44.5-60.5 million per year. The implemented policy aimed to increase the processing of soybeans and rapeseed by Ukrainian plants. As a result, the processors received $\$$26 million and the state budget gained $\$$2-18 million. However, soybean farmers, mostly small and medium-sized, received $ 88.5 million in losses, far outweighing the benefits of processors and the state budget.
context:
Title: Non-refunding of VAT to soybean exporters or economic impact of Soybean amendments. (arXiv:2305.01559v1 [econ.GN])
Abstract: Exempting soybean and rapeseed exporters from VAT has a negative effect on the economy of $\$$44.5-60.5 million per year. The implemented policy aimed to increase the processing of soybeans and rapeseed by Ukrainian plants. As a result, the processors received $\$$26 million and the state budget gained $\$$2-18 million. However, soybean farmers, mostly small and medium-sized, received $ 88.5 million in losses, far outweighing the benefits of processors and the state budget.
translated_title: 豆粕出口商增值税不退税或者豆粕修正案的经济影响
translated_abstract: 免除大豆和菜籽油出口商的增值税对经济造成负面影响，每年损失为4450-6050万美元。所实施的政策旨在增加乌克兰工厂对大豆和菜籽油的加工，因此加工商收到2600万美元，国家预算获得2-1800万美元。然而，大豆种植户，大多数为中小型，损失了8850万美元，远远超过加工商和国家预算的利益。
tldr: 免除豆粕出口商的增值税导致经济损失4450-6050万美元，其中大豆种植户损失最大。
en_tdlr: Exempting soybean exporters from VAT led to an economic loss of 44.5-60.5 million USD per year, with soybean farmers suffering the most.
